name: Climbing Sustained Threshold #2
description:
Today's session focuses on simulating the demands of extended climbing. Riding at the higher end of your Zone 4 threshold power, you will be targeting a cadence similar to climbing. When performing the 4 x 8min intervals, position yourself on the bike as you would climbing seated.
